header.releaseButtonTooltip: Status needs to be "Synced with SAP". Please update SAP quotation or remove not synced items.

confirmDeletePositions.text: Do you really want to delete these entries ({{variable}}) from this case?

confirmRefreshSapPricing.text: Do you really want to refresh the SAP Data for all positions of this case? Be aware this will overwrite the SAP Data of this case.
